opt_alert_h6: Application optimized for tablets and computers
instruct-content2:
This is the time you have to complete your quiz.
The remaining time is displayed at the top of the page.
quest-not-existing: This questionnaire is not registered in our database.
cookies_message: This website uses cookies. We need it to provide you with the best experience possible. We do not track any data about our users.
quest-time-left: This is the time you have left to complete this questionnaire. You can freely close your browser and resume your questionnaire later. You will find it as you left it!
quest_version_not_exist: This version of questionnaire does not exist unfortunately!
error_get_unique_name: Error: The unique file name could not be distributed. Try again and if the problem persists, please let us know.
txt1_end_quest: Congratulations and thank you very much for your time in completing this questionnaire
opt_alert_content: The size of your device will not allow us to provide you with a pleasant experience when completing a questionnaire.
not-enough-data-display-chart: Not enough data available to display this chart
security-message-1: For security reasons, you can not delete more than 5 items at a time
help_multiple_multiple: To select multiple options, hold down the <kbd>ctrl</ kbd> key while selecting them
msg1_welcome: To assess the resilience of farms, we use the SHARP tool, developed by FAO (Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations). The SHARP tool is used in many parts of the world. This application is an adaptation of this tool to the Swiss context, tested and validated by agricultural experts in Switzerland.
question: Question
instruct-title1: Take back where you left off
instruct-content3:
Go back and navigate between the questionnaires whenever you want.
Everything is saved automatically.
score_moyen_cluster: Average score for your production system
delete-participants-also: Also delete participants linked to the questionnaires (definitely)
error_restart_quest: An error has occurred. Please try to re-start a new questionnaire.
instruct-content4:
Once you have completed your questionnaire, you will have access to your score in the form of charts and tables.
You can also save your result in a PDF, or consult these scores online whenever you want.
txt2_end_quest: Your answers have been analyzed, and a score has been assigned to them. Statistics have been calculated automatically based on these scores. The diagrams you will find on the following page represent, based on these scores, the evaluation of the resilience of your farm, for each aspect and section you answered in this questionnaire. In your graphs, you will find points of comparison with the producers of the same production system as you, and with the producers in the same region as you.
alert_choose_quest_version: You must first choose the version of the questionnaire before starting a new session.
alert-edit-aspect-2: You should check your JSON because it looks like it is not valid.
message-edit-aspect-part-2: You don't need to be afraid to make a mistake. If you add JSON that is not correct, you will be notified and your changes will be reverted. Similarly, if you add an aspect that doesn't exist in the list of aspects to display, an error message will be displayed and your changes will not be saved.
instruct-content1:
You do not have time to fill everything today or get tired after a while?
Just close your browser. When you'll come back, your questionnaire will be as you left it!
alert-edit-aspect-1:
You can not fill section names or aspects that do not exist!
Your changes have been reverted to avoid corrupting your files and causing errors.
message-edit-aspect-part-1: You can from this page modify all that compose the questionnaire : The title of the sections, aspects, questions, you can also modify the scores attributed to the questions, decide if a question must be obligatorily filled or not, etc ...
comparaison_score_avg_canton: in comparison with the average of the individuals of the same system of production, and of the same region as you
sharp_meaning: Assessing and strengthening the resilience of farming systems
trash-delete-participants-also: Also archive participants related to the questionnaires
request_location_expired: The request to access your location has expired
message-geolocation: We can fill in the fields below automatically, if you agree to allow geolocation. We do not record any information and will not know your position.
geolocation_denied: You have rejected geolocation for this site.
filters_collected_by: Don't display the questionnaires collected by
item_filter_state_true: You answered %s to the question %s in the aspect %s.
filters-alert-message-string: You do not need to complete this aspect because you meet the following conditions:
filters-alert-message-array: You do not need to fill out questions %s of this aspect because you meet the following conditions:
item_filter_state_false: You did not answer %s to question %s of aspect %s.
pdf-page1-subtitle: Evaluation of the resilience of your farm
login-err-4: Wrong password 5x in a row. Locked for 10 minutes
login-err-1: Could not initiate a secure session (ini_set)
txt_print_end_quest: You will be able to download a PDF file containing the evaluation of your resilience. You can also consult your charts online at any time via the homepage, or via the link in the PDF.
text-error-404: Unfortunately, the page you requested doesn't exist.
